div.ab: It is necessary that the iron wire of its cage be of the thickest, in order that, thinking of leaving, it will not be hurt. Cover, from the moment that it is taken, its cage with canvas.
One needs to feed it the first day, giving uy taking it out from its cage into the hand & opening its beak, & with a small wooden pin, put it in its throat & make it

swallow. And continue thus until
it is no longer opinionated. This is done
for sustaining
it,
for
if it
were to
become thin,
it would die.
